trans-unit.source: Please choose who to notify when comments are added.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo izberite koga obvestiti ko je dodan nov komentar.

trans-unit.source: By default, comments are sorted ascending, starting with the oldest one.
trans-unit.target: Privzeto so komentarji razvrščeni naraščujoče z najstarejšim naprej.

trans-unit.source: Number of comments per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination.
trans-unit.target: Število komentarjev na stran. Nastavite na 0 če ne želite številčenja(paginacije).

trans-unit.source: Approve comments before they are published on the website.
trans-unit.target: Odobrite komentarje preden so objavljeni na strani.

trans-unit.source: Allow visitors to format their comments with BBCode.
trans-unit.target: Dovoli obiskovalcem oblikovanje komentarjev z BB kodo.

trans-unit.source: Allow only authenticated members to create comments.
Use this option only if you have limited comments to authenticated users.
trans-unit.target: Uporabite to možnost samo če ste omejili komentiranje na prijavljene uporabnike.
